name: com.coffee.upm-git-extension
description:
This package enhances the user interface (UI) of the Unity Package Manager (UPM) specifically for packages installed from a git repository.

 - Support GitHub,  GitLab, Bitbucket, etc.
 - Link to the repogitory and offline documents
 - Install the package from git repository with UI
 - Update the package with a specific tag/branch
 - Remove the package
author: mob-sakai <sakai861104@gmail.com> (https://github.com/mob-sakai)
